divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside for a break and looked up to see a silver disc traveling from northeast to southwest. I stared at it to determine if the shape was really a disc. It had no protusions that I could see. It was a very bright, almost white silver and about the hieght of a small airplane. I could hear no sound as it passed over.
Summary: Silver disc traveling in daylight over Denton
trends: There have been 116 other sightings in Dallas
There was one other sighting in Dallas on or around August 7th 2008
